explanation: [0-0] On an asphalt road, a man wearing a red and black checkered shirt and a helmet sits on a motorcycle with its rear wheel off the ground. A man in a green vest bends over behind, holding a camera to film, while many people watch in the distance.

[0-9] The helmeted man then drives the motorcycle forward, the rear wheel always raised. The motorcycle moves forward for a while with its rear wheel lifted, then the rear wheel lands, and the helmeted man fails to stabilize the motorcycle, instantly falling off. The motorcycle loses control and runs forward on its own. The helmeted man rolls on the ground, gets up, and runs after the motorcycle. As the motorcycle and the helmeted man run forward, the surrounding scenery moves backward. The motorcycle continues to run forward, quickly rushing towards a fence before falling to the ground. Many people are watching outside the fence.

[9-15] Then the helmeted man and a man in gray clothes run over together. The scene then switches to the helmeted man sitting on the motorcycle with its rear wheel raised. The helmeted man rides the motorcycle forward for a while. Then, both wheels of the motorcycle touch the ground, and the helmeted man, holding the handlebars, stands on the motorcycle. However, due to instability, he falls off the motorcycle again. He rolls on the ground several times before getting up.
